title: Visitor Map of Yosemite National Park and the...
text:
Thanks for sharing About.com with others! Most Emailed Articles 
How to Outsmart Dog Owners Who Don't Scoop Their Poop Death Valley Yosemite Map 
Yosemite National Park is a big place, but most visitors stick to a small portion of it. This map is made with them in mind. It shows where everything is, where you can stay overnight and where the entrances are. 
This map is interactive and you can click in it to get more information. If you want to see it with a legend alongside - or if you need to get some driving directions, use the full-sized Yosemite map 
The colored markers on this Yosemite map show sights in the park. You can click on them to see what each one is, or here's the key: Blue: Tuolumne Meadows
